deal.title: Seiko SKX007 Automatic Dive Watch - Modded

beats.label: hook
beats.text: Alright watch lovers, stop scrolling! I've got a deal that's too good to keep to myself. You're going to want to hear this if you're into classic dive watches.

beats.label: deal
beats.text: We just spotted a killer deal on eBay: a Seiko SKX007 automatic dive watch, modded, for just $280! That's right, the legendary SKX, ready to hit the waves (or just look amazing on your wrist).

beats.label: value
beats.text: These things are going for way more than that stock, let alone modded! The condition is listed as good, so you're getting a dependable classic with potentially upgraded parts for an absolute steal. This is vintage Seiko value right here.

beats.label: cta
beats.text: Make sure you're following @thehubdeals08 for more insane deals like this. We find luxury deals so you don't have to! Link in bio for the eBay listing.
